graph_title: Average age at first marriage by sex
indicator_name: Average age at first marriage by sex
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
title: Untitled
national_indicator_description: The average age at first marriage is considered to be the average age of a woman (or man) at the time of her first marriage. For the observed year, the average age of a woman (or man) at the time of first marriage is calculated from the rates of first marriage according to the age groups of the bride or groom.
